text: He stressed : " Venezuela 's domestic policy is the exclusive concern of Venezuelans because of our historical tradition and because it is a constitutional mandate . " He added : " There is no reason for any country to request the agreement of others to determine its conduct and adopt its decisions . " Garcia Ponce , who said he was speaking on behalf of the entire CPR , pointed out that it would be " truly inconceivable " that the interference of a state to approve or disapprove the decisions of another or other states became a trait of foreign policy .
